sentences.en: Congress has authorized the president to suspend the operation of a statute.
sentences.cn: 国会已授权总统暂停一项法令的实施.

sentences.en: Germany still has no insider-dealing offence in its statute books.
sentences.cn: 德国的法律条文中仍未设立内幕交易罪。

sentences.en: He agreed with the plurality opinion's reading of the statute.
sentences.cn: 他同意多数意见对法令的理解.

sentences.en: In the last half century, no congressional statute has failed this test.
sentences.cn: 近50年来, 所有的国会法令都经过了这一检验.

sentences.en: Penalties are laid down in the statute .
sentences.cn: 法规中有关于惩罚措施的规定。

sentences.en: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute (= established by law ) .
sentences.cn: 保障消费者权益已有法律明文规定。

sentences.en: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute.
sentences.cn: 保障消费者利益已在法令里作了规定.

sentences.en: The Admiralty court was declared by statute to be a sovereign court.
sentences.cn: 法律规定海事法庭是最高管辖法庭.

sentences.en: The effect of the statute was to annul this covenant.
sentences.cn: 但州法规废除了这一契约.

sentences.en: The independence of the judiciary in France is guaranteed by statute.
sentences.cn: 法国司法部门的独立地位是法律明文规定的。

sentences.en: The new statute covers the care for, bringing up and protection of children.
sentences.cn: 新法令涵盖了儿童保育、养育和保护的相关内容。

sentences.en: The next section will consider this environmental statute in detail.
sentences.cn: 下一部分将详细论述环境法令的问题.

sentences.en: The sole purpose of this statute is to promote mining.
sentences.cn: 这项法令的唯一目的就是要促进矿业开采.

sentences.en: The statute creates no private cause of action for natural resource damage.
sentences.cn: 法令并非导致自然资源破坏反应的秘密原因.

sentences.en: The statute requires various specific control measures in different categories.
sentences.cn: 法令要求在不同类别的地区采用不同的具体控制措施.

sentences.en: Truly there is, both in the Scripture and the statute - book.
sentences.cn: 明明有嘛, 圣经里和法典上全都写着呢.

words.tran_cn: 法定的；法令的；可依法惩处的

trans.tran_en: a law passed by a parliament, council etc and formally written down
